poems.title: Dreams
poems.author: Langston Hughes
poems.text: `Hold fast to dreams  For if dreams die  Life is a broken-winged bird  That cannot fly.  Hold fast to dreams  For when dreams go  Life is a barren field  Frozen with snow.`

poems.title: Still Here
poems.author: Langston Hughes
poems.text: `I been scarred and battered.  My hopes the wind done scattered.  Snow has friz me,  Sun has baked me,  Looks like between 'em they done  Tried to make me  Stop laughin', stop lovin', stop livin'--  But I don't care!  I'm still here!`
